SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Huntington's Disease Cognitive Assessment Battery - Emotion Recognition key variable for composite score: Number of correct responses to the negative expressions (anger, fear, sadness, disgust) out of 24 possible.
Huntington's Disease Cognitive Assessment Battery - HD-CAB total score.

Huntington's Disease Cognitive Assessment Battery - Hopkins Verbal Learning Test - Revised key variable for composite score: Total number of words correctly recalled over Trials 1-4 out of 48 possible.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: HD-CAB - Hopkins Verbal Learning Test Revised

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Huntington's Disease Cognitive Assessment Battery - One Touch Stockings of Cambridge key variable for composite score: Mean time to correct response (sec) averaged across all 10 trials (reverse scored).
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: HD-CAB - One Touch Stockings of Cambridge

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Huntington's Disease Cognitive Assessment Battery - Paced Tapping key variable for composite score: 1/SD of the inter-tap interval for the self-paced taps.
Huntington's Disease Cognitive Assessment Battery - Symbol Digit Modalities Test key variable for composite score: Number of correct responses in 90 seconds out of 110 possible responses.
Huntington's Disease Cognitive Assessment Battery - Trail Making Test-B key variable for composite score: Time to completion (sec) of TMT Part B with upper time limit of 240 seconds (reverse scored).
